overview: When it comes to Love, Sex & Robots, whats love got to do with it? Young couple, Mandy and Michael agree to beta test a home helper android but get more than they bargained for or could have feared. The deeper into the couples lives the robot gets, the more twisted their nightmare becomes. Love hurts; love kills. Can Love, Sex & Robots overcome unbridled jealousy?
tagline: An artificial heart is heartless love
title: Love, Sex & Robots
